articles.title: Married teacher arrested for sex with teen on school property: cops
articles.description: A Kentucky choir teacher faces charges for alleged sex romps with a student on school property after class was dismissed, according to officials. Haley Reed, 35, was arrested Thursday after allegedly confessing to having sex multiple times with the minor at O…

articles.author: By Mike Stunson mstunson@herald-leader.com
articles.title: He’s accused of posing as a cop. The driver he ‘pulled over’ was a real officer.
articles.description: Brandon Hurley was arrested Wednesday for impersonating a police officer and pulling over a real officer, police said. The real officer confirmed Hurley’s identity after recognizing him from the high school they went to together.
